name: Speedman-Rally
description:
A game made for the Nokia 3310 Jam, meant to resemble the games that were available on this phone.

Come dodge trees in a sinuous forest as you try to reach the finish line as fast as possible. Be careful of the obstacle on the side of the road, and of the countdown ticking away, or you won't be declared champion.

Slowly upgrade your car into a dedicated rally machine and try to race your way through bigger and bigger stages. How long can you last, speed man ?...
